casebody.data:
Charles L. RYAN, Director, Arizona Department of Corrections, et al., applicants,
v.
Joseph WOOD, III. No. 14A82. Supreme Court of the United States July 22, 2014.

Opinion

Application to vacate the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granting a conditional preliminary injunction presented to Justice KENNEDY and by him referred to the Court granted. The district judge did not abuse his discretion in denying Wood's motion for a preliminary injunction. Judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit reversing the district court and granting a preliminary injunction vacated.
